allow:
Bash(gh pr create --title "Group management, refresh buttons, and full server refresh" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- **Custom groups**: Create, manage, and toggle visibility of categories per tab \(Live/Movies/Series\)
- **Per-tab refresh buttons**: Inline refresh button on each content page that clears cache for that type and re-fetches from server, with category count in header
- **Full server refresh in Settings**: Clears all local cache and re-fetches every category + all content items, with progress bar, stop button, visible-only toggle, and cache statistics \(item counts per type\)
- **Background refresh**: Refresh runs in a zustand store so it survives navigation — come back to Settings to see progress or stop it
- Updated icons, layout improvements, and build config fixes

## Test plan
- [ ] Click refresh on each tab \(Live, Movies, Series\) — cache clears, categories reload with spinner
- [ ] Category count updates in header after refresh
- [ ] Refresh while inside a category — returns to category list and refreshes
- [ ] Other tabs'' cache is unaffected by refreshing one tab
- [ ] Settings > Data & Cache > Refresh All — full refresh with progress bar
- [ ] Navigate away during refresh, come back — progress still visible
- [ ] Click Stop during refresh — stops gracefully, keeps partial cache
- [ ] Toggle "Only refresh visible groups" — skips hidden categories during refresh
- [ ] Cache stats show correct item counts after refresh
EOF
\)" --base master)
